definition: national general congress/Communist party national congress, in recent times every five years
pinyin: quan2 guo2 dai4 biao3 da4 hui4

definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The highest decision-making body of YBAM calls for a National Convention biennially .
sentences.chinese: 馬佛青最高決策機構爲每兩年召開的全國代表大會。

sentences.english: Great all- China meetings of Party and Red Army delegates were called in May and June.
sentences.chinese: 黨和紅軍的全國代表大會五月和六月間分別召開了。

sentences.english: The 16th National Congress of the Commun is t Party of China (CPC) is the first Party congress held in the new century.
sentences.chinese: 十六大是黨在新世紀召開的第一次全國代表大會。

sentences.english: He is also the youngest Chinese-American delegate at the Republican National Convention.
sentences.chinese: 他也是共和黨全國代表大會最年輕的華裔黨代表。
